name: DIZEM-Bark
description:
Game made with construct 3 for CMPM 80K.

Created by Team Cloud3 (Christopher Cruz, Evan Lew, Xiangdong Che) In the Works Emperor Meowpatine Boss Fight Health Pack Sprite Victory Screen Fine Tuning values and difficulty Credits Programmers Christopher Cruz Evan Lew Xiangdong Che Sprites & Animations Player Ship & Bullets by Evan Lew Enemy Ship & Bullets by Evan Lew All doggos by Xiangdong Che Music Composed & Arranged by Christopher Cruz Attributions Background created using generator by Deep-Fold Toxigenesis font created by Raymond Larabie Parallax effect credited to Amin Hanif.
